body.name: Marvel Hasbro Legends Series Retro Fantastic Four Thing 6-inch Action Figure Toy, Includes 3 Accessory
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 mins
features: 6-INCH-SCALE COLLECTIBLE FIGURE: Fans, collectors, and kids alike can enjoy this 6-inch-scale figure, inspired by the character from Marvel Entertainment
MARVEL ENTERTAINMENT-INSPIRED DESIGN: This 6-inch scale Marvel's Thing figure features premium design, detail, and articulation for posing and display in a Marvel collection
PREMIUM ARTICULATION AND DETAILING: This 6-inch Legends Series Fantastic Four Marvel's Thing figure features multiple points of articulation and is a great addition to any action figure collection.

MARVEL UNIVERSE IN 6-INCH SCALE: Look for other Hasbro Marvel Legends Series figures (each sold separately) with comic- and movie-inspired characters, including Spider-Man, Captain America, and Black Panther. (Additional figures each sold separately. Subject to availability.)
body.description: With his nearly indestructible body and incredible strength and stamina, the Thing possesses the ability to crush evil. With over 80 years of entertainment history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends Series, fan favorite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters are designed with premium detail and articulation for posing and display in collections. From figures to vehicles to premium roleplay items, the Marvel Legends Series offers elite character-inspired product for Marvel fans and collectors. Additional figures each sold separately. Subject to availability. Copyright 2021 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.8 4.8 out of 5 stars 1,779 ratings 4.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "I always wuz the best pizza maker on Yancy Street!"
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Thing to use for a photo project. I like to keep figures stored in the package, so I cut the bottom panel where it meets the card, and two more cuts on the sides, just around the bottom corners. This allows me to bend the panel upward, and slide the inner tray out and re-use the packaging.The joints were really stiff, so I gave him my usual boil and oil treatment: Dunk the figure in a pot of boiling water for 30-45 seconds. Turn the heat off, transfer the pot to the kitchen sink, and empty the water and figure into a plastic colander. While the figure is still warm, apply one or two drops of silicone shock oil to all of the joints, and carefully move them back and forth.Once I got all of the joints working, I upgraded him with a pair of dark blue fabric shorts, and gave him a slice of pizza. He has good articulation, but doesn't have double jointed elbows or bicep swivels, so eating that slice will be a challenge! He has a decent weight to him, and holds poses very well.I like the orange shading used on him, looks like a comic book image I found online, of the Thing taking a pepperoni pizza out of the oven, wearing a chef's hat, apron and oven mitts..a nice touch for a "retro" figure.I'm very happy with the Thing, great price, looks good and feels sturdy...it's clobberin' time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best figure of the lineup
reviews.reviewText: The thing is the best figure out of the fantastic four line and I highly recommend it to any fantastic four fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing figure for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love the monsters of the Marvel Legends line. This is well sculpted well painted and has all the joints that a human has. Comes with 2 heads and 4 hand sculpts that you can switch out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I dig it....
reviews.reviewText: I mean... it is Ben Grimm. The idol of millions. You really cannot go wrong. More "cartoonish" than some of these action figures, he is a fun shelf conversation piece I have no desire to remove from his box. I hope to get a second one of my favorite Marvel hero some day to set up as a book end of sorts. But it looks like the Thing and it was reasonably priced. So worth it as a geek who refuses to let go of his childhood even after crossing over half a hundred years old. Completely recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must for Fantastic 4 Fans!!
reviews.reviewText: I found the other three members of the FF at Walmart, as you can see in the pictures, as well as the two villains, although I didn't buy them. But Ben Grimm aka the Thing was not among them. So, resorting to Amazon, I ordered the figure. And wow, all I can say is that it's really nice looking, love the vivid orangeness of it, heavier and more solid then I expected; great sculpt with similarities and differences to the previous Marvel Legends release being noted. It comes with another head showing Grimm GRIMacing (sorry, had to do it) as he would in the heat of the fight. I really like the packaging as well; the bright colors on the stiff card, the round plastic bubble, cool looking. Quick delivery, on time, great to give as a gift, or to keep in your own collection! Go Hasbro, it's clobberin' time!!😄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best things I bought myself
reviews.reviewText: This guy is Awesome! He looks great! He’s articulate, yet sturdy! He even has some weight to him and the price was lower than most Marvel Legends figures. He reminds me of the old Legends figures that seem to have been made better than the newer ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing figure for an amazing price
reviews.reviewText: This figure is an amazing figure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023

reviews.reviewText: If you like marvels first family you need to make Ben in your top 4 figures to get if you don't have him.The blue eyed ever loving thing is amazing in this retro release
Muito legal, figura a muito tempo aguardada na minha coleção, o preço totalmente acessível, com a confiança de saber que vai chegar certinho e rápido só me faz gostar mais de comprar aqui pela Amazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Convincing model of The Thing. Posable, detailed and well finished, with choice of heads and hands. Good value for money.
Looks very good and very good quality.
